definitions.body: commit fornication, be a harlot (Ar. zanay commit fornication, Aram. zno0, [[זנא]]; cf. Eth. zanyat: effusio seminis virilis, seman effusum, Di:1055; on this and zamawa: (comp. by Ges al.) v. Prät:BAS i. 32, Anm.)—

be or act as a harlot, abs. Ge 38:24 (J), De 22:21 (D), Le 21:9 (H), Ho 4:13, Ho 4:14, Am 7:17; [[זונה]] + [[אשׁה]]([[ה]]) Jos 2:1, Jos 6:22 (J), Le 21:7 (H), Ju Jdg 11:1, Jdg 16:1, Pr 6:26, Je 3:3, Ez Eze 16:30, Eze 23:44; [[זוֹנׇה]] Ge 34:31, Ge 38:15, Jos 6:17, Jos 6:25 (all J), De 23:19, Le 21:14 (H), Pr 7:10, Pr 23:27, Is 23:15, Is 23:16, Joe 4:3, Mic 1:7, Mic 1:7, Ez Eze 16:31; [[נׇשִׁים זׁנוֹת]] 1Ki 3:16; [[נות]]([[ו]])[[ז]] 1Ki 22:38, Pr 29:3, Ho 3:3, Ho 4:14, Ez Eze 16:33; [[בית זונה]] Je 5:7; commit fornication, man's act [[אל]] ´[[ז]] Nu 25:1 (J); of woman's act Ju Jdg 19:2; of land given to harlotry Le 19:29.

fig. of improper intercourse with foreign nations (religious reference sometimes involved) [[את]] ´[[ז]] Is 23:17; [[אחרי]] Ez Eze 23:30; [[אל]] Ez Eze 16:26, Eze 16:28, Eze 16:28; [[תַזְנוּתיה]] ´[[זׁ]] Ez Eze 23:43, Na 3:4; [[וַתִּזֶן אָהֳלָה תַחְתָָּי]] and Ohola committed fornication (whilst) under me Ez Eze 23:5 (cf.
